translations: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

surahs.description: The Opening - The first chapter of the Quran

translations.text: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: In the Name of Allah—the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.
[All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
Praise be to Allah, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: All praise is for Allah—Lord of all worlds.
The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: The Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.
Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: Master of the Day of Judgment.

words.contextualMeaning: and You alone we ask for help

translations.text: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
Thee do we worship, and Thine aid we seek.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: You ˹alone˺ we worship and You ˹alone˺ we ask for help.

words.contextualMeaning: guide us to the right path

translations.text: Guide us to the straight path.
Show us the straight way.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: Guide us to the Straight Path.

ayahs.arabicText: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ

words.contextualMeaning: those who have incurred Your wrath

translations.text: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
The way of those on whom Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace, those whose (portion) is not wrath, and who go not astray.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: The Path of those You have blessed—not those You are displeased with, or those who are astray.

surahs.description: The Cow - The longest chapter of the Quran

words.contextualMeaning: These are the mysterious letters that appear at the beginning of certain surahs

translations.text: Alif, Lam, Mim.
Alif, Lam, Mim.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm.

ayahs.arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

words.contextualMeaning: for those who are conscious of Allah

translations.text: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
This is the Book; in it is guidance sure, without doubt, to those who fear Allah.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: This is the Book! There is no doubt about it—a guide for those mindful ˹of Allah˺.

surahs.description: The Time - A profound reflection on human nature and success

words.contextualMeaning: By the time, By the afternoon

translations.text: By time,
By (the Token of) Time (through the ages),
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

translations.text: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
Verily Man is in loss,
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

ayahs.arabicText: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ

words.grammar: past tense, third person, masculine, plural
words.frequency: Very High - core concept of faith

words.grammar: coordinating + past tense, third person, masculine, plural
coordinating + past tense, third person, masculine, plural
coordinating + past tense, third person, masculine, plural

translations.text: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
Except such as have Faith, and do righteous deeds, and (join together) in the mutual teaching of Truth, and of Patience and Constancy.
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

surahs.description: The Sincerity - A fundamental declaration of Allah's oneness

words.frequency: Very High - common command to Prophet Muhammad PBUH
Highest - the most mentioned word in the Quran

translations.text: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
Say: He is Allah, the One and Only;
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

words.frequency: Highest - the most mentioned word in the Quran

words.contextualMeaning: the Eternal, the Absolute, the Self-Sufficient
words.frequency: Unique - appears only once in the Quran

translations.text: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
Allah, the Eternal, Absolute;
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

words.grammar: present tense, third person, masculine, singular

words.frequency: Very High - common conjunction with negation

words.grammar: present tense, third person, masculine, singular, passive

translations.text: He neither begets nor is born,
He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

words.frequency: Very High - common conjunction with negation

words.grammar: present tense, third person, masculine, singular
words.frequency: Very High - common verb of being
Low - unique usage in this context

translations.text: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
And there is none like unto Him."
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary

surahs.description: The Elephant - The story of the Year of the Elephant

ayahs.arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ

words.grammar: present tense, second person, masculine, singular
past tense, third person, masculine, singular
words.frequency: Very High - common verb of action
Very High - one of Allah's primary attributes

words.contextualMeaning: with the companions, with the people

words.frequency: Low - specific to this historical event

translations.text: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?
translations.source: The Holy Quran: Text, Translation and Commentary
